title: How to start an online book rental service - Quora

response.answer_text: I am not discouraging you but once someone goes online they find all about they know via google search, forums, using e-books and sharing on social media . People are less leaning towards paper edition of books nowadays due to prices, rental fee, saftey of book from climate to insects, and laking space in small houses. So think again about your idea. It would be good choice if you go with e-books.

Buy books, build a website, advertiser e on social media, rent books. However I have to say as much as I am a book lover this idea is quite flawed. Amazon offers a rental service on its books alreadyHow will your cost structure work? Shipments of books to and from a location won't be cheap and you could buy a book for that costLibraries already do this for free
